channel.title: big bird – Angry Bear
channel.description: Slightly left of center economic commentary on news, politics and the economy.

item.title: Big Bird Was Born to Tweet!
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Big Bird Was Born to Tweet! Yesterday, we heard from an 8’2″ affable, yellow bird, who just realized he may not have a job come January. This job seeker has a varied background including Linguist and Mathematics Coach, Skating Carhop, Singer, Dancer, Actor and, most recently, Social Media Maven. (hat tip Bright.com)
item.content:encoded:
Big Bird Was Born to Tweet!

Yesterday, we heard from an 8’2″ affable, yellow bird, who just realized he may not have a job come January. This job seeker has a varied background including Linguist and Mathematics Coach, Skating Carhop, Singer, Dancer, Actor and, most recently, Social Media Maven.

(hat tip Bright.com)
